com.binghamton.jhelp

Interface Validator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BalancedValidator, EnvironmentValidator, JavaValidator, UsageValidator

    public interface Validator
    An interface capturing the ability to validate a set of input according to some constraints.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<JHelpError> buildErrors(JHelpError... errors)
      Utility method to build a List of JHelpErrors
      default boolean isFatal()
      Signifies if any errors this Validator produces are fatal
      java.util.List<JHelpError> validate(java.io.File[] files)
      Validates the files on some criterion

    • Method Detail

      • buildErrors

        static java.util.List<JHelpError> buildErrors(JHelpError... errors)
        Utility method to build a List of JHelpErrors
        Parameters:
        errors - the errors to make the List from
        Returns:
        a List of JHelpErrors

      • validate

        java.util.List<JHelpError> validate(java.io.File[] files)
        Validates the files on some criterion
        Parameters:
        files - the the files to validate
        Returns:
        a List of JHelpErrors, if any, that occured during validation

      • isFatal

        default boolean isFatal()
        Signifies if any errors this Validator produces are fatal
        Returns:
        true iff any errors this Validator produces are fatal and should halt execution
